name: biobb_pytorch Feat2Traj
title: Converts a .pt file (features) to a trajectory using cartesian indices and topology from the stats file.
description: Converts a .pt file (features) to a trajectory using cartesian indices and topology from the stats file.

input_results_npz_path.description: Path to the input reconstructed results file (.npz), typically containing an 'xhat' array

file_formats.description: Path to the input reconstructed results file (.npz), typically containing an 'xhat' array

input_stats_pt_path.description: Path to the input model statistics file (.pt) containing cartesian indices and optionally topology

file_formats.description: Path to the input model statistics file (.pt) containing cartesian indices and optionally topology

input_topology_path.description: Path to the topology file (PDB) used if no suitable topology is found in the stats file. Used if no topology is found in stats

file_formats.description: Path to the topology file (PDB) used if no suitable topology is found in the stats file. Used if no topology is found in stats

output_traj_path.description: Path to save the trajectory in xtc/pdb/dcd format

file_formats.description: Path to save the trajectory in xtc/pdb/dcd format
Path to save the trajectory in xtc/pdb/dcd format
Path to save the trajectory in xtc/pdb/dcd format

output_top_path.description: Path to save the output topology file (pdb). Used if trajectory format requires separate topology

file_formats.description: Path to save the output topology file (pdb). Used if trajectory format requires separate topology

restart.description: Do not execute if output files exist.
